name: medi-ledger
description: Blockchain-based medical record system with ZK proofs and IPFS storage

scripts.setup:powersoftau: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 circom_build/pot12_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute circom_build/pot12_0000.ptau circom_build/pot12_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs powersoftau beacon circom_build/pot12_0001.ptau circom_build/pot12_beacon.ptau 0102030405060708090a0b0c0d0e0f101112131415161718191a1b1c1d1e1f 10 -n="Final Beacon" && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 circom_build/pot12_beacon.ptau circom_build/pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.setup:zkey: npm run setup:powersoftau && snarkjs groth16 setup circom_build/commitment.r1cs circom_build/pot12_final.ptau zkeys/commitment_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute zkeys/commitment_0000.zkey zkeys/commitment_0001.zkey --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs zkey beacon zkeys/commitment_0001.zkey zkeys/commitment_final.zkey 0102030405060708090a0b0c0d0e0f101112131415161718191a1b1c1d1e1f 10 -n="Final Beacon phase2" && snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier zkeys/commitment_final.zkey contracts/Verifier.sol
scripts.clean: npx hardhat clean && rm -rf circom_build/* zkeys/* proof_data/*

author: MediLedger Team
